Package controller

Class CreateViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.CreateViewController
public class CreateViewController extends Object
Handles view of creating a customer.

    • onClickAddButton

      void onClickAddButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles add button. First, it goes through input validation and sets error message depending on whether the input is valid. If all input is valid, either create a new customer or update an existing one if it is in update mode.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException
